comment.author: 15826935@N06
comment._content: Game 4 was played Oct. 11th, Game 5 was played the 12th at Fenway. I believe this photo was taken on the Oct. 11th. www.baseball-almanac.com/ws/yr1912ws.shtml

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: PeaceLoveScoobie: The source you cited shows that game 4 of the 1912 World Series was played on Oct. 11. We will change the description to add this date.  Thank you!
